name: Ghost Rush: Halloween Edition
description:
Shoemaker's Last proudly presents:  Ghost Rush: Halloween Edition!

Game play is deceptively simple. You control a ghost that is in constant motion along a circular path. The left joystick button is the only control. Press it to change directions. Collect the candy dots for points... but avoid the spider-bat coming at you from the top, and later scary enemies from the sides!

Ghost Rush: Haloween Editions runs on a 64K CoCo 1 or 2, or a CoCo 3. On a CoCo 3 only, pressing [P] on the title screen will cycle through different color sets for both RGB and composite monitors.

The game is in 100% machine language using a 128x96 hires graphics mode in either 4 or 16 colors.

Many thanks to Steve Bjork for sharing his random number generator routine, and to Rick Adams for sharing his 4-voice music routine.

There are three versions of the game on the virtual disk:

  1. GRHW16.BIN runs in 16 colors on a CoCo 3 only
  2. GRHW.BIN runs in 4 colors using the CoCo's artifact color palette (blk/red/blu/blk) on a CoCo 1, 2 or 3
  3. GRHWDA.BIN runs in 4 colors using the standard CoCo color palette (grn/ylw/blu/red) on a CoCo 1, 2 or 3.  

After downloading from the link below, insert or mount the disk.  Next, LOADM the desired version and type EXEC to start!
